footer.tagline: The ultimate social platform for gamers. Find your squad, build your community, and never game alone again.

home.subtitle: Swipe. Match. Game Together.
home.lead: The ultimate platform for gamers to find their perfect teammates, build lasting communities, and level up their gaming experience.
home.featuresSub: Discover features designed to connect gamers and build the ultimate gaming community
home.feature1Desc: Our AI-powered algorithm matches you with gamers who share your playstyle, skill level, and gaming preferences.
home.feature2Desc: Connect across PC, PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and mobile. Find teammates regardless of your platform.
home.feature3Desc: Create or join gaming communities, organize tournaments, and build lasting friendships with fellow gamers.
home.howSub: Finding your gaming squad has never been easier
home.how1Desc: Set up your gaming profile with your favorite games, skill level, and what you're looking for in teammates.
home.how2Desc: Browse through potential teammates and communities. Swipe right on profiles that interest you.
home.how3Desc: Start chatting, plan gaming sessions, and build your ultimate gaming squad for epic adventures.
home.ctaSub: Join the gaming revolution and connect with players who share your passion

games.title: Popular Games
games.subtitle: Find your gaming community in the most popular titles. Connect with players who share your passion and skill level.
games.notFound: No games found. Please check back later.

blog.title: BLOG
blog.subtitle: Gaming tips, strategies, and news. Everything you need to level up your game and find your perfect squad.
blog.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to get the latest gaming news, tips, and updates delivered straight to your inbox.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions about Gamerplug? Need support? We're here to help you connect with the gaming community.
contact.emailDesc: Need help with your account, have a question, or want to report an issue? Send us an email and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.followDesc: Stay updated with the latest news, features, and community highlights. Follow us on Twitter for real-time updates and gaming tips.
contact.faqSub: Common questions about Gamerplug and how to get started

profile.userNotFoundBody: The user you're looking for doesn't exist.

hero.subtitle: Get your ideal player plugged in.

features.title: Level Up Your
features.subtitle: We've packed GamerPlug with everything you need to dominate the competition and find your people.
features.aiMatchingDesc: Our algorithm analyzes KD, win rate, and playstyle to pair you with teammates who actually complement your gameplay.
features.platformSyncDesc: Seamlessly connect your Steam, PSN, and Xbox accounts to show off your verified stats and ranks.
features.squadBuilderDesc: Create permanent parties, organize tournament teams, or just find a 5th for a quick ranked session.
features.toxicFreeDesc: Community driven reputation system ensures you play with chill people. Zero tolerance for rage-quitters.
features.lowLatencyDesc: Plan your strategies before you even launch the game with our built-in high fidelity voice and text chat.
features.tournamentsDesc: Join exclusive community tournaments directly through the app. Win prizes, skins, and bragging rights.

howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to stop playing with randoms and start winning with a coordinated team.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Link your stats, set your schedule, and choose your titles.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Browse tailored recommendations. Swipe right to squad up.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Chat, party up, and climb the leaderboards together.

cta.subtitle: Join thousands of gamers who are matching, chatting, and winning together right now.

phone.profileDesc: Immortal 3 Valorant player. Looking for a laid back duo or trio. No toxicity pls.

affiliates.title: Partner with
affiliates.subtitle: Join our squad. Monetize your influence. Help us cure gaming loneliness.
affiliates.applyDesc: Fill out the form below to join our affiliate program.
affiliates.whatIsSubtitle: The product you will be promoting.
affiliates.whatIsDesc1: GamerPlug is a swipe-based social platform designed to foster meaningful relationships for gamers worldwide. Founded in September 2025 and based in Austin, Texas, GamerPlug serves as a "borderless connector," helping moderate to serious gamers find their squad in a bot-free environment.
affiliates.whatIsDesc2: Unlike traditional platforms, GamerPlug users upload gameplay clips instead of static profile pictures, allowing the community to connect based on playstyle and skill. With a focus on safety and reducing friction, the platform solves the growing problem of loneliness in the gaming community.
affiliates.whyCareSubtitle: Key selling points for your content.
affiliates.clipFirstDesc: No catfish or bots. Users match based on actual gameplay video clips, ensuring skill and vibe compatibility.
affiliates.safetyDesc: A prioritized organized environment that eliminates the friction of finding a new community.
affiliates.futureFeaturesDesc: "Looking for Groups" (LFG) scheduling and "Game Now" for instant lobbies.
affiliates.stephanosDesc: The vision carrier. Stephanos focuses on keeping the team vibe high and leading strategic user acquisition.
affiliates.hunterDesc: Chief Visionary Officer. Hunter works to strengthen the community connection and product roadmap.
